Author: loversalibi
Text: omg thank you for saying this, now i know why i often feel like a trash balloon when i eat fruit after a meal!!!

Author: lemonye
Text: fruit is very rapidly absorbed so if you have a lot after a meal it can potentially interfere with digestion. Also there is fructose malabsorption, it could be that. I had that problem for the longest time, thankfully it seems like i can have some fruit now but not too much
